Package seng202.group2.controller

Class CSVExporter

java.lang.Object
seng202.group2.controller.DataExporter
seng202.group2.controller.CSVExporter
public class CSVExporter
extends DataExporter
A crime data exporter used to export crime data to CSV file format. Uses OpenCSV for writing to CSV files. IMPORTANT: This class currently makes the assumption that the given file path to export to, points to an empty or non-existent file.
Author:
Connor Dunlop

  • Constructor Details

    • CSVExporter

      public CSVExporter​(java.io.File file) throws UnsupportedFileTypeException, java.io.IOException
      Constructs a CSVImporter, setting the file path and instantiating the file reader.
      Parameters:
      file - A File instance constructed from the path of the file to be imported from.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the given file could not be opened for reading.
      UnsupportedFileTypeException - if the file is not a CSV
